name: Ona koja mjeri
summary: Are we truly free? Are our desires truly our own or merely imposed products of the society we live in? The question this film is asking is this: are we slaves to the culture and society we were born in or is there a way to escape after all?
info:
• 中文名: 他和她的自由行
  • 上映年度: 2008-03-22(克罗地亚)
  • 片长: 6分51秒
  • 导演: Veljko Popovic
  • 编剧: Veljko Popovic
